properties.entry:
Round 11 Instructions

In the past rounds the water availability was stable at a level of 30 cubic feet per second for each round. In the following 10 rounds the average water supply remains 30 cfps, but the actual water supply in each round will vary between 20 cfps and 40 cfps. After you have made your investment decisions, the infrastructure level will be displayed as well as the actual water supply for that round.
